text: You walk over to Tristan's desk and pick your finger on his shoulder to get his attention. He quickly closes down what he had up on his computer. text: You finish the extremely boring internship and graduate university. You didn't really learn a lot, because Merkeware's code was terribly build, but you did earn a new enemy: Tristan. You're certain you will despise that man for the rest of your life.

text: You walk back to your desk. You are thinking if you should tell your best friend Brangäne about what you just saw.

title: You Won't Believe What Just Happened
text: You tell Brangäne about what you just saw, and you tell her that you are planning to murder Tristan by giving him a glass of milk, because he is extremely lactose intolerant. She tells you it's an extremely bad idea.

title: Okay, Maybe It Wasn't Such A Good Idea
text: You listen to Brangäne's advice. Murder isn't a good idea. Although you now have a deep and burning hate for Tristan, you manage to rein it in and finish your internship. You graduate university, feeling betrayed.

title: I Have To Kill Him
text: You insist that you have to this in order to avenge Melot. You walk to the kitched to prepare the glass of milk. You pour it into an opaque mug with a lid to prevent Tristan from seeing the mug's contents.

title: Noticed Brangäne
text: You notice that Brangäne too is in the kitchen. She puts back a carton of lactose free milk in the fridge and walks back to her department with a mug that looks exactly like yours. They must be pretty popular.

title: Assassination Time
text: You walk back to the office. You offer the milk to Tristan, and he accepts it without giving it a second thought. You take a seat at your desk again and wait for Tristan's death to come.

title: Waiting
text: You wait for what feels like an eternity, but nothing happens. You start to think about this decision, and realize that maybe you have targeted the wrong person. Maybe it is not Tristan who's the enemy. Maybe it is Merke, whom Tristan probably got his orders from.

title: The Realization
text: You stand up and walk over to Tristan. He thanks you for the lactose free milk.

title: The Lactose Free Milk
text: At first, you are a bit confused as to what exactly Tristan is talking about. Then you remember Brangäne and the lactose free milk in the kitched a bit earlier. She switched out the regular milk for lactose free milk. You tell him that it was no problem.

title: A Happy End
text: Tristan sighs and apologizes for killing Melot. He had no choice, he tells you. You accept the apology and you become friends. You realize that the real enemy is Merkeware Inc. and Tristan decides to quit working at Merkeware Inc. as soon as you have finished your internship. You graduate university, and you have gained a really good friend.

title: The Lactose Free Milk?
text: You look at him, confused. Did you accidentally take lactose free milk instead of regular milk? It doesn't matter now. You were lucky that you didn't kill him. That might have been the biggest mistake in your entire life.

title: Waiting
text: You wait for what feels like an eternity. Suddenly, you hear heavy breaths from the other side of the table, and then a thud. You peek above your monitor and see Tristan lie still on the floor.

title: Time To Go!
text: You realize it might be best to escape before somebody notices that you are there, so you do. You return the other day, and everything is back to normal, just as you had expected. Any trace of Tristan is gone, as usual when somebody within Merkeware dies. You finish your internship, and graduate university with a burning hate for Tristan, but also for Merkeware Inc.

title: Called Security
text: You call security, and within minutes they are there. They examine the body, and the mig. Since you were the only person in the room, you get arrested for the murder, and since your fingerprings were found on the mug, you get sentenced to a lifetime in prison for murder.
